msg: Fix bug 40720. Adding a group to a user caused an exception.

author: grahamd
msg: (MODPYTHON-207) The attribute req.args is now modifiable and can be set

author: grahamd
msg: The attribute req.used_path_info is now modifiable and can be set from
within handlers. This is equivalent to having used the AcceptPathInfo
